subtitle: Live 1-on-1 coaching that builds real fluency — for your career, your travels, your life. Real coaches. Real conversations. Real results.
features_subtitle: What makes us different from everything else you've tried
feature1_text: Learn by speaking with expert coaches who adapt to you in real-time — not by tapping on a screen.
feature2_text: We don't sell courses. We help you achieve goals — nail interviews, lead meetings, travel confidently.
feature3_text: Book sessions on your schedule. Track your progress with clear milestones you can actually feel.
feature4_text: Whether you're prepping for a big moment or building long-term fluency — we scale with your needs.
how_subtitle: Three steps to becoming the speaker you want to be
how_step1_text: A quick consultation to understand where you are and where you want to go.
how_step2_text: We match you with an expert who gets you — and adapts every session to your needs.
how_step3_text: Practice what matters. Track your growth. Feel the difference within weeks.
curr_subtitle: Practical skills you can use the same day
curr1_desc: Speak naturally in meetings, calls, and everyday life.
curr2_desc: Own the room with clear narratives and confident delivery.
curr3_desc: Craft emails and messages that sound sharp and get responses.
curr4_desc: Walk into any interview knowing exactly what to say.
coaches_subtitle: Expert trainers who've been where you want to go
coaches_note: We'll match you with the perfect coach for your goals
coach1_bio: Former enterprise trainer. Specializes in client-facing roles and confident speaking.
coach2_bio: Ex-consultant. Helps craft persuasive narratives for high-stakes moments.
coach3_bio: Led global teams. Mentors on clarity, influence, and executive presence.
cases_subtitle: See what's possible when you commit to speaking
case1_text: A software engineer went from avoiding calls to leading client meetings in 8 weeks.
case2_text: A graduate landed their dream job after targeted interview coaching.
case3_text: A manager transformed team presentations and earned a promotion.
testi1_quote: I finally feel like myself when I speak. My coach helped me find my voice.
testi2_quote: Two months with Speexify changed more than years of studying ever did.
testi3_quote: Every session is practical. I can feel the progress after every call.
faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know to get started
faq1_q: How do you match me with a coach?
faq1_a: We consider your goals, level, industry, and schedule to suggest the perfect coach for you.
faq2_a: Absolutely. If the fit isn't right, switch anytime without losing progress.
faq3_q: What if I'm a complete beginner?
faq3_a: We work with all levels. Your coach adapts to meet you where you are.
faq4_q: How much time does it take?
faq4_a: Most learners do 1–2 sessions per week. Even that makes a real difference.
newsletter_sub: Practical insights from our coaches — no spam, just value.
cta_sub: Join thousands who stopped waiting and started speaking. Your transformation begins today.
